Title: Madagascar
Writer: Mark Burton, Billy Frolick, Eric Darnell, Tom McGrath
Actors: Ben Stiller, Chris Rock, David Schwimmer, Jada Pinkett Smith
Plot: A group of animals who have spent all their life in a New York zoo end up in the jungles of Madagascar, and must adjust to living in the wild.
Language: Greek, American Sign Language, English, Portuguese, Spanish, German, French
